import React from "react" import { Dropdown, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Button, Header, Image, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import "../App.css" const options = [ { key: 1, text: 'ETH', value: 1 }, { key: 2, text: 'UNI', value: 2 }, { key: 3, text: 'DAI', value: 3 }, ] const euPool=1200 const edPool=1200 const udPool=1200 let ethNum=20 let uniNum=60 let daiNum=200 let ethPrice=30 let uniPrice=10 let daiPrice=20 class Otoken extends React.Component { state={ tokenNum:null, open:false } componentDidMount(){ console.log(options) } async handleChangeNum1(event){ if(this.state.value !== null){ console.log(event) await this.setState({tokenNum: event.target.value}) } } async handleChangeToken1(event,{value}){ await this.setState({value}) } render(){ const { value } = this.state return(
} labelPosition='left' placeholder='0.00' /> } labelPosition='left' placeholder='0.00' /> setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} trigger={} > Select a Photo
